results.content: Google has changed the api-interface. This course is outdated. I would appriciate if there would be a note what has changed. After Google search I've learned that the properties are still the same but the name of the ng-selectors were changed. Look at the official google link to https://stackblitz.com/edit/angular-google-maps-demo?file=app%2Fapp.component.html.

results.content:
30$ for a 10 min lecture in google maps with angular 2. The course is clearly outdated - it doesn't even use https://angular-maps.com/ .

If you want to pay 30$ for 10min of slow typing, recompiling since there was a typo, and perhaps a few things to learn (the very basics - which is described in the docs) go for it. Can't recommend it.

For me this is closer to a scam than to a value product

results.content: I have taken dozens of tutorials, courses and lectures during my career from many sources and this is the best instructor I've ever found. He is the only person that puts enough emphasis in understanding what's going on behind the scenes instead of just explaining what to do to make it work in certain conditions without understanding why and how it works to be able to apply to any case.
